# getUsagePage | Apple Developer Documentation

Instance Method# getUsagePage

DriverKit 19.0+macOS

```
uint32_t getUsagePage();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/hiddriverkit/iohidelement/getusagepage#return-value)

Returns the element’s usage page. Usage pages are defined in [HID Usage Tables](/documentation/hiddriverkit/hid-usage-tables).
